law.catch_line: Children that board may have committed.
law.history: Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 386, sec. 41, effective June 21, 1974. -- Amended 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 173, sec. 6, effective June 18, 1964. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 938b-9.
